install.name: WysiwygPro 3
install.author: Chris Bolt
install.description: WysiwygPro 3 Component. WysiwygPro Component Installation Complete. If you have installed the 4 plugins then you have now completed installation. INSTALLATION INFORMATION: WysiwygPro contains a large number of configuration options that you can change by Navigating to Extensions, Plugin Manager and selecting WysiwygPro 3. If you don't see a feature in the editor that you were expecting then please check the configuration options as some features are disabled by default. After installing don't forget to verify that WysiwygPro 3 is now listed as the default editor under Site, Global Configuration. For help please see the manual included in the ZIP file. Thank you for choosing WysiwygPro!
